duties_responsibilities.duty: Collaborate with first-line management to guarantee the availability of the technical inputs for 3rd party software license procurement and software maintenance renewals.
Serve as a Professional Buyer / Designated Procurement Representative (DPR) and Subcontract Technical Representative (STR) for purchases via Ariba catalogs and PCard.
Proactively anticipate, identify, and address supplier performance issues to ensure software maintenance dates are met.

Work with Procurement to evaluate and recommend potential Suppliers based on Management Level (Quality Level), and establish technical and performance requirements of the item or services to be procured.
Assist the Procurement Specialist with supplier negotiations as required.
Collaborate with internal legal counsel to ensure procurement specifications meet prime contract requirements.
Analyze market trends, customer behavior, and competitor activity to identify growth opportunities and refine strategies.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's Degree in a relevant area from an accredited institution and a minimum of 5 years related experience; or, an equivalent combination of education and experience.
Active DOE L or Q clearance, or equivalent, transferable clearance.
